summary.span: 提供使你能够读取和写入调试符号信息的类，如到 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 映射的源行。

span.span: Provides classes that allow you to read and write debug symbol information, such as source line to Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) maps.

summary.span: 面向 .NET 的编译器可将调试符号信息存储到程序员的数据库 (PDB) 文件中。

span.span: Compilers that target .NET can store the debug symbol information into programmer's database (PDB) files.

summary.span: 调试器和代码探查器工具可以在运行时读取调试符号信息。

span.span: Debuggers and code profiler tools can read the debug symbol information at run time.
